nodes.text: The Gorensla kajidic was one of several Hutt clans that ran criminal operations in the galaxy. Many of Gorensla's activities were based on Toydaria, especially in the city of Riar. The kajidic ran Bog Bay, a collection of landing pads in Riar, and worked with the artifacts dealer Walisi. When Walisi was kidnapped, Gorensla investigated.
